text: I seem to remember there being some sort of Julia environment command to create a temporary environment. I tried looking through Pkg and Julia docs but didn't find anything. Does anyone know what I am talking about?

elements.text: I seem to remember there being some sort of Julia environment command to create a temporary environment. I tried looking through Pkg and Julia docs but didn't find anything. Does anyone know what I am talking about?

text:
Computational Thinking Pluto notebooks have these, although usually with many more packages.
```begin
	using Pkg
	Pkg.activate(mktempdir())
	Pkg.add([
			Pkg.PackageSpec(name="PlutoUI",version="0.7"),
			])

	using PlutoUI
end```
